price: Me Wura Nyankopͻn, εneε εmfa me nka nnipa bͻnefoͻ no ho.“
arabic: رَبِّ فَلَا تَجۡعَلۡنِي فِي ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: rabbi falā tajʿalnī fī al-qawmi al-ẓālimīna
